parameters.query:
WITH campos AS (
  SELECT
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_tipo_pago }}')  AS nombre_tipo_pago
),
validacion AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN nombre_tipo_pago IN ('undefined','') OR nombre_tipo_pago IS NULL
      THEN 400
      ELSE 200
    END AS code,
    CASE
      WHEN nombre_tipo_pago IN ('undefined','') OR nombre_tipo_pago IS NULL
      THEN 'Falta el campo: nombre'
      ELSE 'Inserci칩n exitosa'
    END AS message
FROM campos
),
insertado AS (
  INSERT INTO tipos_pago (
      nombre_tipo_pago,
      fecha_registro,
      fecha_actualizacion
  )
  SELECT
      c.nombre_tipo_pago,
      NOW(),
      NOW()
  FROM campos c
  CROSS JOIN validacion v
  WHERE v.code = 200
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  (SELECT code FROM validacion)        AS code,
  (SELECT message FROM validacion)     AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(insertado.*) FROM insertado),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

WITH campos AS (
  SELECT
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_cliente }}')              AS nombre_cliente,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.apellido_cliente }}')            AS apellido_cliente,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.telefono_cliente }}')            AS telefono_cliente,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.correo_electronico_cliente }}')  AS correo_electronico_cliente
),
faltantes AS (
  SELECT
    CONCAT_WS(', ',
      CASE WHEN nombre_cliente   IN ('undefined','') OR nombre_cliente   IS NULL THEN 'nombre'   END,
      CASE WHEN apellido_cliente IN ('undefined','') OR apellido_cliente IS NULL THEN 'apellido' END,
      CASE WHEN telefono_cliente IN ('undefined','') OR telefono_cliente IS NULL THEN 'telefono' END,
      CASE WHEN correo_electronico_cliente IN ('undefined','') OR correo_electronico_cliente IS NULL THEN 'correo' END
    ) AS lista_faltantes
  FROM campos
),
validacion AS (
  SELECT
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> '' THEN 400 ELSE 200 END AS code,
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> '' THEN 'Falta el campo: ' || lista_faltantes
         ELSE 'Inserci칩n exitosa'
    END AS message
  FROM faltantes
),
insertado AS (
  INSERT INTO clientes (
      nombre_cliente,
      apellido_cliente,
      telefono_cliente,
      correo_electronico_cliente,
      fecha_registro,
      fecha_actualizacion,
      activo
  )
  SELECT
      c.nombre_cliente,
      c.apellido_cliente,
      c.telefono_cliente,
      c.correo_electronico_cliente,
      NOW(),
      NOW(),
      true
  FROM campos c
  CROSS JOIN validacion v
  WHERE v.code = 200
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  (SELECT code FROM validacion)        AS code,
  (SELECT message FROM validacion)     AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(insertado.*) FROM insertado),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

WITH campos AS (
  SELECT
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_usuario }}')  AS nombre_usuario,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.contrase침a }}')      AS contrase침a,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.email }}')           AS email,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.id_rol }}')          AS id_rol
),
faltantes AS (
  SELECT
    CONCAT_WS(', ',
      CASE WHEN nombre_usuario IN ('undefined','') OR nombre_usuario IS NULL THEN 'nombre'     END,
      CASE WHEN contrase침a    IN ('undefined','') OR contrase침a    IS NULL THEN 'contrase침a' END,
      CASE WHEN email          IN ('undefined','') OR email          IS NULL THEN 'email'      END,
      CASE WHEN id_rol         IN ('undefined','') OR id_rol         IS NULL THEN 'rol'     END
    ) AS lista_faltantes
  FROM campos
),
validacion AS (
  SELECT
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> '' THEN 400 ELSE 200 END AS code,
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> ''
         THEN 'Falta el campo: ' || lista_faltantes
         ELSE 'Inserci칩n exitosa'
    END AS message
  FROM faltantes
),
insertado AS (
  INSERT INTO usuarios (
      nombre_usuario,
      contrase침a,
      email,
      fecha_registro,
      fecha_actualizacion,
      activo,
      id_rol
  )
  SELECT
      c.nombre_usuario,
      c.contrase침a,
      c.email,
      NOW(),
      NOW(),
      true,
      c.id_rol::int
  FROM campos c
  CROSS JOIN validacion v
  WHERE v.code = 200
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  (SELECT code FROM validacion)        AS code,
  (SELECT message FROM validacion)     AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(insertado.*) FROM insertado),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

WITH validacion AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN '{{ $json.body.nombre_estado_entrega }}'          = 'undefined'
        OR TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}')    = ''
        OR '{{ $json.body.nombre_estado_entrega }}'          IS NULL
      THEN 400
      ELSE 200
    END AS code,
    CASE
      WHEN '{{ $json.body.nombre_estado_entrega }}'          = 'undefined'
        OR TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_estado_entrega }}')    = ''
        OR '{{ $json.body.nombre_estado_entrega }}'          IS NULL
      THEN 'Falta el campo nombre de tipo entrega'
      ELSE 'Inserci칩n exitosa'
    END AS message
),
insertado AS (
  INSERT INTO estado_entrega (nombre_estado_entrega, fecha_registro, fecha_actualizacion)
  SELECT
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_estado_entrega }}'),
    NOW(),
    NOW()
  WHERE (SELECT code FROM validacion) = 200
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  (SELECT code FROM validacion)        AS code,
  (SELECT message FROM validacion)     AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(insertado.*) FROM insertado),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

WITH campos AS (
  SELECT
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_tipo_entrega }}')  AS nombre_tipo_entrega
),
faltantes AS (
  SELECT
    CONCAT_WS(', ',
      CASE WHEN nombre_tipo_entrega IN ('undefined','') OR nombre_tipo_entrega IS NULL THEN 'nombre de tipo entrega' END
    ) AS lista_faltantes
  FROM campos
),
validacion AS (
  SELECT
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> '' THEN 400 ELSE 200 END AS code,
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> ''
         THEN 'Falta el campo: ' || lista_faltantes
         ELSE 'Inserci칩n exitosa'
    END AS message
  FROM faltantes
),
insertado AS (
  INSERT INTO tipos_entrega (
      nombre_tipo_entrega,
      fecha_registro,
      fecha_actualizacion,
      activo
  )
  SELECT
      c.nombre_tipo_entrega,
      NOW(),
      NOW(),
      true
  FROM campos c
  CROSS JOIN validacion v
  WHERE v.code = 200
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  (SELECT code FROM validacion)        AS code,
  (SELECT message FROM validacion)     AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(insertado.*) FROM insertado),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

INSERT INTO ventas (
    id_cliente,
    id_usuario_registro,
    id_tipo_pago,
    id_tipo_entrega,
    id_estado_entrega,
    fecha_entrega_estimada,
    fecha_entrega_real,
    observaciones,
    fecha_registro,
    fecha_actualizacion,
    total_general,
    id_estado_pago,
    total_pagado,
    saldo_pendiente
) VALUES (
    '{{ $json.body.id_cliente }}'::int,
    '{{ $json.body.id_usuario_registro }}'::int,
    '{{ $json.body.id_tipo_pago }}'::int,
    '{{ $json.body.id_tipo_entrega }}'::int,
    '{{ $json.body.id_estado_entrega }}'::int,
    NULLIF(TRIM('{{ $json.body.fecha_entrega_estimada }}'), '')::timestamp,
    NULLIF(TRIM('{{ $json.body.fecha_entrega_real }}'), '')::timestamp,
    NULLIF(TRIM('{{ $json.body.observaciones }}'), ''),
    NOW(),
    NOW(),
    '{{ $json.body.total_general }}'::numeric(12,2),
    '{{ $json.body.id_estado_pago }}'::int,
    '{{ $json.body.total_pagado }}'::numeric(15,2),
    '{{ $json.body.saldo_pendiente }}'::numeric(15,2)
)
RETURNING id_venta;

WITH
venta_insertada AS (
    INSERT INTO ventas (id_cliente, id_usuario_registro, id_tipo_pago, id_tipo_entrega, id_estado_entrega, total_general, fecha_registro, fecha_actualizacion, fecha_entrega_estimada, fecha_entrega_real, observaciones)
    VALUES (1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 195.50, '2025-10-29T10:00:00', '2025-10-29T10:00:00', '2025-10-30T18:00:00', NULL, 'Entregar con cuidado y confirmar llegada.')
    RETURNING id_venta
),
entrega_insertada AS (
    INSERT INTO entregas (id_venta, direccion_entrega, nombre_receptor, telefono_receptor, costo_delivery, nombre_sucursal, fecha_recojo_programada, observaciones)
    SELECT v.id_venta, 'Calle Ficticia 123, Zona Sur', 'Ana Garcia', '+591 71112233', 15.00, NULL, NULL, 'Llamar al llegar.'
    FROM venta_insertada v
    WHERE true
),
detalles_expandidos AS (
    SELECT
        v.id_venta,
        idx,
        (detalle->>'id_producto')::INTEGER AS id_producto,
        (detalle->>'id_tamano')::INTEGER AS id_tamano,
        (detalle->>'cantidad')::NUMERIC AS cantidad,
        (detalle->>'precio_unitario_venta')::NUMERIC AS precio_unitario_venta,
        (detalle->>'subtotal')::NUMERIC AS subtotal,
        detalle->'frase' AS frase_data,
        detalle->'personalizacion' AS personalizacion_data
    FROM venta_insertada v, jsonb_array_elements('[
      {
        "id_producto": 1,
        "id_tamano": 1,
        "cantidad": 1.00,
        "precio_unitario_venta": 150.50,
        "subtotal": 150.50,
        "frase": { "texto": "Feliz Cumple, Ana!", "comentario_frase": "Letra dorada", "costo": 5.00 },
        "personalizacion": { "imagen_base64": "data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgo...", "comentario_personalizacion": "Foto de un perro", "costo": 25.00 }
      }
    ]'::jsonb) WITH ORDINALITY AS t(detalle, idx)
),
detalles_insertados_raw AS (
    INSERT INTO detalles_venta (id_venta, id_producto, id_tamano, cantidad, precio_unitario_venta, subtotal)
    SELECT id_venta, id_producto, id_tamano, cantidad, precio_unitario_venta, subtotal
    FROM detalles_expandidos
    RETURNING id_detalle_venta, id_venta, id_producto, id_tamano, cantidad, precio_unitario_venta, subtotal
),
detalles_con_idx AS (
    SELECT
        di.id_detalle_venta,
        de.idx,
        de.frase_data,
        de.personalizacion_data
    FROM detalles_insertados_raw di
    JOIN detalles_expandidos de ON
        di.id_venta = de.id_venta AND
        di.id_producto = de.id_producto AND
        di.id_tamano = de.id_tamano AND
        di.cantidad = de.cantidad AND
        di.precio_unitario_venta = de.precio_unitario_venta AND
        di.subtotal = de.subtotal
),
frases_insertadas AS (
    INSERT INTO frases (id_detalle_venta, texto, comentario_frase, costo)
    SELECT
        di.id_detalle_venta,
        di.frase_data->>'texto',
        di.frase_data->>'comentario_frase',
        (di.frase_data->>'costo')::NUMERIC
    FROM detalles_con_idx di
    WHERE di.frase_data IS NOT NULL AND di.frase_data <> '{}'::jsonb
),
personalizaciones_insertadas AS (
    INSERT INTO personalizaciones (id_detalle_venta, imagen_base64, comentario_personalizacion, costo)
    SELECT
        di.id_detalle_venta,
        di.personalizacion_data->>'imagen_base64',
        di.personalizacion_data->>'comentario_personalizacion',
        (di.personalizacion_data->>'costo')::NUMERIC
    FROM detalles_con_idx di
    WHERE di.personalizacion_data IS NOT NULL AND di.personalizacion_data <> '{}'::jsonb
)
SELECT id_venta FROM venta_insertada;

WITH validacion AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN '{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}'          = 'undefined'
        OR TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}')    = ''
        OR '{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}'          IS NULL
      THEN 400
      ELSE 200
    END AS code,
    CASE
      WHEN '{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}'          = 'undefined'
        OR TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}')    = ''
        OR '{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}'          IS NULL
      THEN 'Falta el campo nombre'
      ELSE 'Inserci칩n exitosa'
    END AS message
),
insertado AS (
  INSERT INTO roles (nombre_rol, fecha_registro, fecha_actualizacion)
  SELECT
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_rol }}'),
    NOW(),
    NOW()
  WHERE (SELECT code FROM validacion) = 200
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  (SELECT code FROM validacion)        AS code,
  (SELECT message FROM validacion)     AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(insertado.*) FROM insertado),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

WITH del AS (
  DELETE FROM clientes
  WHERE id_cliente = COALESCE( (NULLIF('{{ $json.query.id_cliente }}',''))::int, 0 )
  RETURNING id_cliente
)
SELECT
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 200
       ELSE 404
  END AS code,
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 'Borrado exitoso'
       ELSE 'Error registro inexistente'
  END AS message;

WITH del AS (
  DELETE FROM tipos_pago
  WHERE id_tipo_pago = COALESCE( (NULLIF('{{ $json.query.id_tipo_pago }}',''))::int, 0 )
  RETURNING id_tipo_pago
)
SELECT
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 200
       ELSE 404
  END AS code,
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 'Eliminaci칩n exitosa'
       ELSE 'Error registro inexistente'
  END AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(del) FROM del LIMIT 1),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

WITH del AS (
  DELETE FROM usuarios
  WHERE id_usuario = COALESCE( (NULLIF('{{ $json.query.id_usuario }}',''))::int, 0 )
  RETURNING id_usuario
)
SELECT
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 200
       ELSE 404
  END AS code,
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 'Borrado exitoso'
       ELSE 'Error registro inexistente'
  END AS message;

WITH del AS (
  DELETE FROM roles
  WHERE id_roles = COALESCE( (NULLIF('{{ $json.query.id_rol }}',''))::int, 0 )
  RETURNING id_rol
)
SELECT
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 200
       ELSE 404
  END AS code,
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM del) THEN 'Eliminaci칩n exitosa'
       ELSE 'Error registro inexistente'
  END AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(del) FROM del LIMIT 1),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;

WITH campos AS (
  SELECT
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.nombre_empresa }}')  AS nombre_empresa,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.direccion }}')       AS direccion,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.ciudad }}')          AS ciudad,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.telefono }}')        AS telefono,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.email }}')           AS email,
    TRIM('{{ $json.body.contacto }}')        AS contacto
),
faltantes AS (
  SELECT
    CONCAT_WS(', ',
      CASE WHEN nombre_empresa IN ('undefined','') OR nombre_empresa IS NULL THEN 'nombre_empresa' END,
      CASE WHEN direccion      IN ('undefined','') OR direccion      IS NULL THEN 'direccion'      END,
      CASE WHEN ciudad         IN ('undefined','') OR ciudad         IS NULL THEN 'ciudad'         END,
      CASE WHEN telefono       IN ('undefined','') OR telefono       IS NULL THEN 'telefono'       END,
      CASE WHEN email          IN ('undefined','') OR email          IS NULL THEN 'email'          END,
      CASE WHEN contacto       IN ('undefined','') OR contacto       IS NULL THEN 'contacto'       END
    ) AS lista_faltantes
  FROM campos
),
validacion AS (
  SELECT
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> '' THEN 400 ELSE 200 END AS code,
    CASE WHEN lista_faltantes <> ''
         THEN 'Falta el campo: ' || lista_faltantes
         ELSE 'Inserci칩n exitosa'
    END AS message
  FROM faltantes
),
insertado AS (
  INSERT INTO proveedores (
      nombre_empresa,
      direccion,
      ciudad,
      telefono,
      email,
      contacto,
      fecha_registro,
      fecha_actualizacion,
      activo
  )
  SELECT
      c.nombre_empresa,
      c.direccion,
      c.ciudad,
      c.telefono,
      c.email,
      c.contacto,
      NOW(),
      NOW(),
      true
  FROM campos c
  CROSS JOIN validacion v
  WHERE v.code = 200
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT
  (SELECT code FROM validacion)        AS code,
  (SELECT message FROM validacion)     AS message,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT to_jsonb(insertado.*) FROM insertado),
    '{}'::jsonb
  ) AS data;
